body_content.explanation: If a piece of jewellery, art, etc., is unmounted, it is not set on or attached to something to display it:
examples: 24 carats refers to the weight of the unmounted diamond, before it is set into a ring.
All photographs submitted to the contest should be unmounted and cut to size.

body_content.explanation: not riding a horse or other animal, or (of an animal) without a rider:
examples: Two dozen unmounted police officers were on patrol at the parade.
The painting shows an unmounted white charger loose on the battlefield.

body_content.explanation: (of a disk or disk drive) no longer available for use on a computer:
examples: Once unmounted, a CD-ROM can be automatically ejected.
